original_title: 湾岸バッド・ガールズ
overview: Akemi is the captain of the special attack squad of the ladies "Purple Cats". However, in fact, he was helping in a fight with the hostile organization "Female Madness" who received a reward ... The female Yankee series following the "Outlaw Retsuden" and "The Deadliest" series!
title: Gulf Bad Girls
